column4: hi, im in the middle of installing, but I dont know what partition to make bigger, /root or /home. What should I choose?
/home is where all your user documents are going to be stored, by default -- i'd make /home larger, big enough to store all the documents, etc. you'd be storing ..
When I had suse, I was installing a lot of software, and /root got clogged up, I wont be storing many documents, but just having ubuntu as a development environment, should I make /root bigger?
yes, then probably you don't need too much for you /home partition ...
